Class C4Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • CharMatrix
      • C4Game

  • public class C4Game
extends CharMatrix
    This class is a CharMatrix and inherits all of its methods. It is responsible for taking care of the main functionality of the game, and the only class that knows the actual rules of the game.
    Version:
    5/25/2020
    Author:
    Vivek Alumootil, Mihir Kelkar, Period - 4, Assignment - APCS Final Project Connect 4, Sources - None

    • Constructor Detail

      • C4Game

        public C4Game(BoardPanel b)
        C4Game constructor which passes the rows and columns of b to its parent constructor. Then it initializes the fields in the class.
        Parameters:
        b - the BoardPanel which this game will follow.

      • C4Game

        public C4Game(C4Game other)
        a cloning constructor. This creates a completely new C4Game object based off of the information from the parameter.
        Parameters:
        other - the game information needed to clone

    • Method Detail

      • addConnect4

        public void addConnect4(Connect4 connect)
        The main game class that will implement the rules in this game.
        Parameters:
        connect - a Connect4 object used to initialize myConnect4 field.

      • isWon

        public int isWon()
        getter method for won field
        Returns:
        won a -1 if nobody, 1 if red is the winner, 2 if yellow is the winner

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(int col,
                     int val)
        This method executes the current player's turn. It calls the setToken method to update the game with the designated value (1, or 2). Then creates a C4GameRunnable class to implement the animation of the coin falling from the mouse y_location to the bottom-most available level.
        Parameters:
        col - - the col to insert
        val - - either 1 or 2 depending on whether it is red's or yellow's turn
